questions.explanation:
Moses.

	Woody was understudying for a play called "An Evening with the Prophets". As far as I could find, this play does not actually exist and was just made up for the show.

Suzanne Porter.

	Suzanne Porter was played by Shanna Reed. Reed was born in October in Kansas City, Kansas. Incidentally, Kansas is where Kirstie Alley is from, who played Rebecca Howe on "Cheers".

Denise.

	Denise was an old girlfriend of Sam's. She was one of thousands of girlfriends that he has had in his lifetime.

questions.text: Who did Sam say had a big mouth?
questions.explanation:
Cliff.

	Cliff said, "He happens to be right you know." Then he explained how Clavins all have two extra teeth.

questions.text: What did the woman who called Sam want?
questions.correct: to show him a baby that might be his
options: to go out on a date
questions.explanation:
to show him a baby that might be his.

	She said it was between him and another guy. Sam said, "the kid's a real looker, so you figure it out."

questions.text: How long did Sam say he would go without sex?
questions.explanation:
3 months.

	Carla said that 3 months for Sam was equivalent to what most people had in a lifetime. It was very difficult for Sam to do this however.

questions.text: Who did Sam think Woody was?
questions.explanation:
God.

	Woody was excited that Sam thought he was God. However, he wanted to know how to sound less like God and more like Moses.

questions.text: What did the priest say the church recommends for unmarried people?
questions.explanation:
chastity.

	Sam laughed when the priest said this. Then he said, "you're serious aren't you?"

questions.text: What verse did Sam try to use to get to have sex before his time period was up?
questions.correct: "With the Lord one day is as a 1000 years, and a 1000 years is as one day."
options: "For God so loved the world that he gave his only begotten Son that whosoever believeth in Him shall not perish but have everlasting life."
"Trust in the Lord with all your heart and lean not on your own understanding."
"The wages of sin is death, but the gift of God is eternal life forever"
"With the Lord one day is as a 1000 years, and a 1000 years is as one day."
questions.explanation:
"With the Lord one day is as a 1000 years, and a 1000 years is as one day."

	Sam tried to convince Carla that he'd been celibate for thousands of years. Carla said nice try but it wasn't going to work.

questions.text: What stopped Sam from having sex?
questions.correct: He found a Bible in the hotel room.
options: He thought the girl was really ugly.
questions.explanation:
He found a Bible in the hotel room.

	Frasier was about to point out that all hotels have Bibles, but Carla pointed out a miracle that Sam encountered so Frasier didn't say anything about the Bibles in hotel rooms. Sam almost lost it however when Rebecca asked him to zip her dress up, so they brought him over to the piano to get his mind off sex.
